'Not much longer till the preliminaries\nare over now.'%K%P
We had pushed through over 3 months\nof preliminary auditions, and now there were\nonly a few days left. %K%P
The big screen in front of Akihabara station\nshowed videos of the participants day in, day out.%K%P
But a big screen like that\njust couldn't bring out their real charm.%K%P
Even still though, seeing the two of them up there\nmade me extremely happy.%K%P
At this point most of the spots were set.%K%P
But for groups that were closer to the cut-off line, \nit was an incredibly important time.%K%P
And that was us. Right on the cut off line...%K%P
'Hi, we're Love☆Kami! \nThe preliminaries are almost over! \nThank you all so much for your support!'%K%P
'Please vote for us, Love☆Kami!'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura were passing out handmade\nflyers to passersby.%K%P
And there I was, taking pictures of it all\nfor their activity log.%K%P
They also got the chance to go on stage\nat the goddess cafe that Kagura worked part time at.%K%P
The whole atmosphere, with the crowd and everything,\nwas much different than when we took that video.%K%P
Shuri had seemed quite anxious at first,\nbut she had started to get used to it.%K%P
'We're so cuuuuuute!\nHey...do we really have to do this?'%K%P
'Come on now, don't get all embarrassed. \nLook, everyone's enjoying it.'%K%P
Shuri was helping out at the cafe\nas a way to repay them for using the stage.%K%P
She didn't seem to quite understand\nwhat drew people to maid cafes.%K%P
Their activities as a duo went by\nin a crazy hustle and bustle.%K%P
Only the gods could tell if they would make it\nthrough the primaries now.%K%P
And then it was here,\nthe final night of the preliminaries.%K%P
Shuri and Kagura were at my house so we could\nsee it all through to the end together.%K%P
'Come on in, you two. \nThe preliminaries are already over, huh.'%K%P
'Sara? What are you doing here?'%K%P
'I just couldn't help myself. \nAnd when I heard you two would be coming,\nI decided I'd join.'%K%P
'Hooray! We'll definitely make it with Sara's help!'%K%P
'Uhh, I don't think there's any helping\nleft to do here.'%K%P
'Oh come now, you aren't going to toss\nuseless old me out, are you?'%K%P
*Sniff sniff*%K%P
'Hey! Who do you think you are making Sara cry!'%K%P
'Oh give me a break. She's a huge faker.'%K%P
'Want some eye drops?'%K%P
'Oh, thanks sweetie. \nNow I can REALLY cry.'%K%P
'Really cry, huh?'%K%P
Realizing it was all a ploy,\nShuri suddenly grew impatient.%K%P
'Mmm, this is some good tea.'%K%P
We sipped on the tea that Sara made for us,\nand watched the votes pour in.%K%P
As time drew close,\nthe poll numbers seemed to explode.%K%P
As the last hour drew in, the polls would remain\nopen, but the results were to be pulled from view.%K%P
We would basically just be left in the dark.%K%P
'Well? Where are we at?'%K%P
'You're probably around 5th, and Kagura around 7th.'%K%P
Only five idols would be selected from the\npreliminaries. It was looking rough for Kagura,\nbut Shuri wasn't safe either.%K%P
'Come oooon! Come ooooooon!'%K%P
'There's nothing you can do now.'%K%P
'Guess I just better pray.\nOh great and powerful gods...'%K%P
It was serious business when a goddess\ndecided to ask all the gods for help.%K%P
But it wasn't just Kagura, Shuri sat with her hands\nclenched, and expression hardened.%K%P
And just like that, we were at the last hour.%K%P
'Well, now we have no way of telling.'%K%P
All that we could do was wait it out.%K%P
But even still, none of us had the energy\nto do anything else at all.%K
